Sequence Information.Peptide Name: BmKn2K7 (BmKn2 analog, synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (84.62%) toparent peptide BmKn2I=K: 23%, L=F=A: 15%.Activity: active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 29213, B. cereus ATCC 11778, three Gram- bacteria: S. typhimurium ATCC 14028, E. aerogenes ATCC 13048 and E. coli ATCC 25922.Structure: random coil in water and become helical in 50% TFE.In vitro toxicity: human RBC: HC50 <10 ug/ml, hemolytic.
Literature Information.Author: Bea Rde L, Petraglia AF, Johnson LE. 2015
Literature Information.Title: Synthesis, antimicrobial activity and toxicity of analogs of the scorpion venom BmKn peptides
